state: You are now playing a life changing game of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First, it would be a great idea if you could make an effort to travel west. With that over with, try to travel west. And then, move south. And then, try to take a trip east. Next, attempt to travel south. And then, make an effort to venture east. If you can accomplish that, try to go to the north. After that, head east. With that over with, try to move north. Then, go to the north. With that done, venture west. With that over with, attempt to move west. Okay, and then, attempt to go to the west. And then, retrieve the keycard from the floor of the kitchenette. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Playroom =- You are in a playroom. An usual one. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a recliner. The recliner is standard. However, the recliner, like an empty recliner, has nothing on it. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Playroom =-0/1
next_state: -= Bedroom =- You arrive in a bedroom. A typical one. You see a mantle. The mantle is typical. But there isn't a thing on it. There is an unblocked exit to the east.
